segments.text: I'm looking at this kitchen scene; it's quite detailed for a line drawing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's an adult woman standing at the sink, drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems completely engrossed in her task, which is rather peculiar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is fully on, and the sink is clearly overflowing with water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is just pouring over the front edge and onto the cabinets below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see a significant puddle forming on the floor around her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of her feet is actually standing right in that growing pool of water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's truly astonishing how utterly unaware she appears to be of the deluge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression remains so neutral, like nothing out of the ordinary is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of all that water damage just makes me cringe a little.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I really worry she's going to slip and hurt herself in that mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a small disaster unfolding right under her very nose, unnoticed.
segments.speaker: PAR
